payment-list.title: Список заявок

message.text: Конечная дата должна быть больше либо равна начальной

payment-list.hql-query: select payment from com.rssl.phizic.business.documents.LossPassbookApplication as payment where payment.owner.id = :loginId and (:state is null or :state = '' or payment.state.code = :state) and (:fromDate is null or payment.dateCreated >= :fromDate) and (:toDate is null or payment.dateCreated < :toDate + 1 ) and (:payerAccount is null or :payerAccount = '' or payment.attributes['deposit-account'].stringValue = :payerAccount) order by payment.dateCreated desc
